text: wysr kafaar quraysh ealaa alshirk biallah mae zuhur btlan maa hum elyh, fahum yaebudun alht, lam yanzil fi kitab min katab allah burhan bi'anaha tslh llebadt, wala eilm lahum fima akhtlqwh, waftrwh ealaa allh, wa'iinama hu 'amr atabaeuu fih aba'ahm bila dlyl. fa'iidha ja' waqt alhisab fi alakhirat falays lilmushrikin nasir ynsrhm, 'aw yadfae eanhum aledhab
